title: Personal Website
desc: The very site you are on right now! This website will be my hub of where I showcase all my projects, mostly focused on frontend development but I may explore other types of projects.

title: Icy Veins Wireframes/Prototype
desc: Icy Veins is A website that provides guide & news on a variety of games, focusing on MMORPGs. However, I believe Icy Veins' navigation system can be a little confusing. After competitor analysis, card sorting, tree testing, usability testing, and more, I created a Figma prototype of a re-structured Icy Veins.

title: Fridge Buddy
desc: A front-end prototype made using React, Tailwind, and DaisyUI of a smart fridge app that displays/manages inventory, recipes, play music, and more.
